metadata.title: CVE-2022-48698 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix memory leak when using debugfs_lookup() When callingdebugfs_lookup() the result must have dput() called on it, otherwise thememory will leak over time. Fix this up by properly calling dput().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
